mutants.code:
def calculate_worst_case_clicks(n, answers):
    j = 1
    total_clicks = sum(answers)
    for i in range(n):
        total_clicks += j * (answers[i] - 1)
        j += 1
    return total_clicks

def calculate_worst_case_clicks(n, answers):
    j = -1
    total_clicks = sum(answers)
    for i in range(n):
        total_clicks += j * (answers[i] - 1)
        j += 1
    return total_clicks

def calculate_worst_case_clicks(n, answers):
    j = 1
    total_clicks = sum(answers)
    for i in range(n):
        total_clicks += j * (answers[i] - 1)
        j += 1
    return total_clicks

def calculate_worst_case_clicks(n, answers):
    j = 0
    total_clicks = sum(answers)
    for i in range(n):
        total_clicks -= j * (answers[i] - 1)
        j += 1
    return total_clicks

def calculate_worst_case_clicks(n, answers):
    j = 0
    total_clicks = sum(answers)
    for i in range(n):
        total_clicks += j * (answers[i] - 1)
        j -= 1
    return total_clicks

    j = 0
    total_clicks = sum(answers)
    for i in range(n):
        total_clicks += j / (answers[i] - 1)
        j += 1
    return total_clicks
